name: Gobs of the Deep
description:
Can you defeat the king Gob?

WASD, Space, Mouse, Escape or LStick, LB, RStick, RB, Start/Back

Tip: Hold the jump button to jump more easily on walls, and move toward the wall to get grip on it.

If you get stuck just hit Escape and restart!
Don’t get discouraged! In a lack of time to design a level it became short but quite hard instead.

(It is actually possible to beat the game)

Created using Godot, and assets with Gimp, Paint, sfxr, BitFontMaker2.

Edit: Version 1.1 fixes broken sound for taking small amount of damage, uses the medium sound instead.
